lines.text: Duh... My name is Filligan, and I'm gonna catch an R-A-T, mouse.

How do you do, Mr. Filligan? My name's Sniffles. Why you gonna catch a mouse? Why do cats always try to catch mouses? Mouses don't try to catch a cat, because what would a mouse do with a cat if a mouse could caught a cat? Can you tell a mouse from a cat? Can you? Huh?
Duh... You bet I can. You can't fool me because I'm too stupid!
